name: GAME #24 with no real title
description:
GAME #24 with no title (yet)

12.11.21 | 7pm-ish

Hey you! Yes you!
We're making this game at the moment! We just finished a first prototype of it and we now we want ✨you ✨ to try it!

Would you be so kind as to be part of a playtest for us? We promise this game doesn't suck! And if it does suck, at least it's very short!

You're in? Good!
Could you be the best and fill this short form after you play? That'd help a lot! You really are the best!
